document_data.caption: A map showing the Skulkway and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Skulkway
document_data.mainbody: The '''Skulkway''' was a small corner road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Skulkway was located in the northwestern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It cut the corner between [[Westwall Street]] and the [[Street of Glances]] several buildings short of the intersection of the two larger streets.
document_data.Description: A single building occupied the Skulkway. The building was actually an empty shell with holes in the wall large enough to allow carts to pass through. A [[wizard]] cast [[illusion]]s to hide the cart openings. The ruse worked until the entire building vanished one day.
document_data.History: The street's name was derived from the fact that it was used to literaly skulk past the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]], prompting a stationary watch to be stationed there.
